name: Dual Diagnosis Management
overview:
About Foundations Associates Founded in 1995, Foundations Associates quickly established itself as a premier organization for treating persons with addiction and mental health disorders. Foundations offers a continuum of care for the dual diagnosed, including outpatient services, vocational rehabilitation, and an 88-bed residential component in both Nashville and Memphis, Tennessee. The treatment program incorporates the 12-step philosophy of Dual Recovery Anonymous while utilizing motivational interviewing techniques, and has a proven successful outcome. Foundations residential model has achieved some remarkable and measurable outcomes with the dual diagnosed, and is nationally regarded as an exemplary program.

With a highly experienced and caring staff, comprehensive treatment facilities, and a long-term commitment to helping those with co-occurring conditions, Foundations provides a full scope of services to meet the needs of persons with co-occurring conditions. All staff are trained in integrated dual diagnosis treatment are employed by Foundations.
